numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a fact about the National Basketball League.
2. The National Basketball League has had the same percentage of players of color for 2 years.
3. I notice a fact about the Women's National Basketball League.
4. The Women's National Basketball League has had the same percentage of players of color for 2 years.
5. I notice that the number of players of color is greater than the number of head coaches of color.
6. I wonder why the percentages differ greatly.
7. I wonder whether this data can be applied internationally.
8. I wonder how these percentages compare to other sports such as tennis.
9. I wonder how these percentages compare to other sports such as track.
11. There is a lack of diversity among coaches.
12. Many players are people of color.
13. Few head coaches are people of color.
14. If few head coaches are people of color, then some kids can be discouraged.
15. Some kids have a dream to become a head coach in these sports.
16. The headline is: Statistics show the truth about diversity in these major league sports.
